newsitem.title: ITALY: Olivetti denies plans for capital increase.
newsitem.headline: Olivetti denies plans for capital increase.

text.p: Italian information technology group Olivetti categorically denied that it was planning a capital increase, a company spokesman said on Friday.
The Olivetti spokesman said that the company, "denies categorically whatever the idea of a capital issue".

Olivetti shares declined 6.62 percent on Thursday due to market talk concerning a possible capital increase. The shares on Friday rose 2.92 percent to 582 lire by 0815 GMT in a firmer Milan stock market.
